urls.title: cookie
urls.description: Select and block the adjacent seat to travel with double the space. Check availability on your flight by entering your flight information. The availability of this product depends on the aircraft’s occupancy when the flight date is near. We recommend checking the availability 72 hours before an international flight and 48 hours be fore a domestic one. Utilizamos cookies propias y de terceros para mejorar tu navegación por nuestra página web y mostrarte publicidad relacionada con tus preferencias mediante

data.text:
Fly with extra space! Now you can block the adjacent seat so you can stretch out a little bit. 😴

Check if there's space available on your upcoming flight here: https://t.co/grpa0cm869 https://t.co/f99M6IXfuY
